verses.text: I saw the Lord standing upon the altar : and he said , Smite the lintel of the door , that the posts may shake : and cut them in the head , all of them; and I will slay the last of them with the sword : he that fleeth of them shall not flee away , and he that escapeth of them shall not be delivered.\f + \fr 9.1 \ft lintel: or, chapiter, or, knop\f*\f + \fr 9.1 \ft cut…: or, wound them\f*
Though they dig into hell , thence shall mine hand take them; though they climb up to heaven , thence will I bring them down :

And though they hide themselves in the top of Carmel , I will search and take them out thence; and though they be hid from my sight in the bottom of the sea , thence will I command the serpent , and he shall bite them:
And though they go into captivity before their enemies , thence will I command the sword , and it shall slay them: and I will set mine eyes upon them for evil , and not for good.

And the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* of hosts \add is\add* he that toucheth the land , and it shall melt , and all that dwell therein shall mourn : and it shall rise up wholly like a flood ; and shall be drowned , as \add by\add* the flood of Egypt.

\add It is\add* he that buildeth his stories in the heaven , and hath founded his troop in the earth ; he that calleth for the waters of the sea , and poureth them out upon the face of the earth : The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* his name.\f + \fr 9.6 \ft stories: or, spheres: Heb. ascensions\f*\f + \fr 9.6 \ft troop: or, bundle\f*

\add Are\add* ye not as children of the Ethiopians unto me, O children of Israel ? saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. Have not I brought up Israel out of the land of Egypt ? and the Philistines from Caphtor , and the Syrians from Kir ?

Behold, the eyes of the Lord 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d* \add are\add* upon the sinful kingdom , and I will destroy it from off the face of the earth ; saving that I will not utterly destroy the house of Jacob , saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

For, lo, I will command , and I will sift the house of Israel among all nations , like as \add corn\add* is sifted in a sieve , yet shall not the least grain fall upon the earth.\f + \fr 9.9 \ft sift: Heb. cause to move\f*\f + \fr 9.9 \ft grain: Heb. stone\f*
All the sinners of my people shall die by the sword , which say , The evil shall not overtake nor prevent us. \p

¶ In that day will I raise up the tabernacle of David that is fallen , and close up the breaches thereof; and I will raise up his ruins , and I will build it as in the days of old :\f + \fr 9.11 \ft close: Heb. hedge, or, wall\f*

That they may possess the remnant of Edom , and of all the heathen , which are called by my name , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* that doeth this.\f + \fr 9.12 \ft which…: Heb. upon whom my name is called\f*

Behold, the days come , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that the plowman shall overtake the reaper , and the treader of grapes him that soweth seed ; and the mountains shall drop sweet wine , and all the hills shall melt.\f + \fr 9.13 \ft soweth: Heb. draweth forth\f*\f + \fr 9.13 \ft sweet: or, new\f*

And I will bring again the captivity of my people of Israel , and they shall build the waste cities , and inhabit \add them;\add* and they shall plant vineyards , and drink the wine thereof; they shall also make gardens , and eat the fruit of them.
And I will plant them upon their land , and they shall no more be pulled up out of their land which I have given them, saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God.
